text: Marielena Davila (born in Caracas, Venezuela), is a Venezuelan actress and singer. She is the daughter of Venezuelan actress Chiquinquirá Delgado and the actor Guillermo Dávila. == Filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" |+ Film |- ! Year !! Title !! Role !!
